page.title: 14Mortimer Nature Walks
page.content: (6&7 yrs accounts) We went for a walk round the school to find wild flowers. We also went for trips in the car around the area to find more flowers. We saw yellow, white, blue, red, pink and purple flowers. They were mainly white. We saw lots of{buttercups}and {daisies}in the fields and{dead-nettle and{cow parsley}in the hedges. The {primrose}and the{cowslip}are not common any more. Some of our favourites were the{poppy, bluebell, {Herb Robert}and{Lady's Smock.}We thought the{dandelion}was a weed. My rabbit likes it. We didn't like the smell of the{garlic mustard.}The bees liked the{honey-suckle.}The blue {forget-me-not}grows all over. We hold the{buttercup}under our chin to see if we like butter. We made chains with the{daisies,}to put round our head. The{foxglove}is poisonous.
